name: Super Breakfast Rush
description:
Super Breakfast Rush is a Student Project from Wise Pie Studio, a team studying at SAE Quantum in Melbourne, Australia.

Inspired by classic skill testers and the janky physics sandbox game play of titles such as QWOP and Surgeon Simulator, wrestle control of a cereal box with a mind of its own and "Fill it or Spill it, Junior!".

Enjoy this early build as we close in on our final stages of production!
